LanguageData.PrisonLabor_VeryGoodTreatment.stages.0.d: In this prison I've been treated very well.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_LowMotivation.stages.0.label: not supervised
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_LowMotivation.stages.0.descr: Nobody cares if I'm working or not.
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_FreeTime.stages.0.label: free time
LanguageData.PrisonLabor_FreeTime.stages.0.descriptio: Even tough I'm prisoner, I can still have some free time.
